name: INSearchForMessagesIntent
desc: A request to list the messages that match the specified criteria.

items.name: init(recipients: [INPerson]?, senders: [INPerson]?, searchTerms: [String]?, attributes: INMessageAttributeOptions, dateTime: INDateComponentsRange?, identifiers: [String]?, notificationIdentifiers: [String]?, speakableGroupNames: [INSpeakableString]?, conversationIdentifiers: [String]?)
items.desc: Creates a search messages intent object with the specified search criteria.

items.name: var recipients: [INPerson]?
items.desc: The contacts who are the recipients of the messages.

items.name: var recipientsOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the recipients in the search criteria.

items.name: var senders: [INPerson]?
items.desc: The senders to include or exclude when you search for messages.

items.name: var sendersOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the senders in the search criteria.

items.name: var speakableGroupNames: [INSpeakableString]?
items.desc: The names of any groups associated with the message.

items.name: var speakableGroupNamesOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the group names in the search criteria.

items.name: var searchTerms: [String]?
items.desc: The terms to look for in the messages.

items.name: var searchTermsOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the set of terms in the search criteria.

items.name: var dateTimeRange: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The range of dates in which to search for messages.

items.name: var attributes: INMessageAttributeOptions
items.desc: The attributes that must be present on a message to yield a match.

items.name: var identifiers: [String]?
items.desc: The message identifiers to locate in your search.

items.name: var identifiersOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the identifiers in the search criteria.

items.name: var conversationIdentifiers: [String]?
items.desc: The conversation identifiers to locate in your search.

items.name: var conversationIdentifiersOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the conversation identifiers in the search criteria.

items.name: var notificationIdentifiers: [String]?
items.desc: The notification identifiers to locate in your search.

items.name: var notificationIdentifiersOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to use the notification identifiers in the search criteria.
